Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Chicago in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/2015, off George Davenport (SLB)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against New York on 7/17/2015...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2015, hitting .381 with 8 HR, 18 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2015, hitting .389 with 7 HR, 24 RBI...
Won MVP in 2015, hitting .328 with 36 HR, 104 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2016, hitting .400 with 4 HR, 6 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Brooklyn on 5/31/2016...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2016, hitting .370 with 8 HR, 26 RBI...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Sets a new season NL-Record for RBI with 118 on 9/27/2016...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2016, hitting .391 with 5 HR, 21 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2016, hitting .478 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/5/2017 to a 6-year deal worth $13,000,501 per year...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against St. Louis (B) on 8/2/2017...
Won MVP in 2017, hitting .330 with 30 HR, 106 RBI...
